version_description:
- added a player strength indicator (only for offline games)
- added an option to configure how player names are visualized
- solved an automa error discarding wrong cards in discard pile
- minor bug fixed

If you enjoy playing 'Scala 40' please take a minute to leave a nice review: it really helps

- online game improvements
- fixed a bug in new automatic players
- minor bug fixed

If you enjoy playing 'Scala 40' please take a minute to leave a nice review: it really helps

- solved an error in sequences generation

- online game improvements
- fixed a bug in new automatic players
- minor bug fixed

If you enjoy playing 'Scala 40' please take a minute to leave a nice review: it really helps

If you have questions or need support please contacts us from 'Feedback / Contacts us' present in the help menu of the game

- if a crash occurs during an offline game, it is now possibile to contact Tech Support so they will analyse the problem
- offline games interrupted by crashes do not assign penalties to your leaderboards

- new conifgurable option: Appearance -> 'Show status bar (clock and battery) while game is in progress'
- new conifgurable option: Appearance -> 'Hide completed sets (4 cards without jokers)'
- new conifgurable option: Appearance -> 'Defer touches on home indicator at bottom of the screen (only for iPad and iPhone without the home button)'
- solved and error related to discarding the last card in hand

v. 7.0.0 (702)
- new online game system, now connections are more stable and in absence of real players online you will play against automata
- compatible with iOS 10,11 and 12 (goodbye iOS9, I'm sorry I do not have enough resources to manage more than three versions of iOS at a time)
- added suspension and recovery for the offline game (now you can suspend a single game, play a score one and then resume the suspended single game)
- now your hand is sorted taking into account double cards (you can restore the previous sorting system from the settings)
- new soundtracacks available (you can also listen your music while playing, just start your favorite music app before playing)
- new gestures for moving cards in the hand and on game field. For example now you can drag from the hand (with two fingers) a 345 on the meld 6789 on the field, producing the sequence 3456789
- new settings panel (some of the previously configured settings could be lost, in case reconfigure your favorite options)
- less invasive advertising banners
- imrpoved help section
- replaces the the stats section (now stats are kept online for one month)
- this version is the result of many months of work (the whole game has been rewritten in Swift language), if you encounter problems get to life using the Feedback / Contact function from the help menu or write an email to info@onmadesoft.com

v. 6.0.7 (611)
- minor bugs fixed


If you enjoy playing this game please take a minute to leave a nice review: it really helps.

If you have questions or need support please contact us from 'Feedback / Contacts us' present in the help menu of the game.

- some improvements to management of cards in player hand (especially for older devices like some iPad and iPhone 5c)
- solved an error that let you discard a card that could be used to take a joker
- solved an online game error

v. 7.0.1 (703)
- new conifgurable option: Appearance -> 'Show status bar (clock and battery) while game is in progress'
- new conifgurable option: Appearance -> 'Hide completed sets (4 cards without jokers)'
- new conifgurable option: Appearance -> 'Defer touches on home indicator at bottom of the screen (only for iPad and iPhone without the home button)'
- solved and error related to discarding the last card in hand

v. 7.0.0 (702)
- new online game system, now connections are more stable and in absence of real players online you will play against automata
- compatible with iOS 10,11 and 12 (goodbye iOS9, I'm sorry I do not have enough resources to manage more than three versions of iOS at a time)
- added suspension and recovery for the offline game (now you can suspend a single game, play a score one and then resume the suspended single game)
- now your hand is sorted taking into account double cards (you can restore the previous sorting system from the settings)
- new soundtracacks available (you can also listen your music while playing, just start your favorite music app before playing)
- new gestures for moving cards in the hand and on game field. For example now you can drag from the hand (with two fingers) a 345 on the meld 6789 on the field, producing the sequence 3456789
- new settings panel (some of the previously configured settings could be lost, in case reconfigure your favorite options)
- less invasive advertising banners
- imrpoved help section
- replaces the the stats section (now stats are kept online for one month)
- this version is the result of many months of work (the whole game has been rewritten in Swift language), if you encounter problems get to life using the Feedback / Contact function from the help menu or write an email to info@onmadesoft.com
